game.name: Scrapnaut
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Scrapnaut는 steampunk 요소가 포함 된 하향식 기반 건물 생존 게임입니다. 다양한 생물 군계로 열린 세상을 탐험하고, 산소를 관리하고, 농장을 관리하고, 전기를 생산하고, 집을 짓는 등 다양한 작업을 수행하세요!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Scrapnaut is a co-op & singleplayer top-down, base building survival game with steampunk elements. Explore an open world with different biomes, take care of oxygen, manage your farms, generate electricity, build your home and much more!
